wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Leonard (11 July 1927 – 1987) was an English footballer who made 26 appearances in the Football League playing as a centre half for Darlington in the 1950s. He also played non-league football for South Shields. He died in Wearhead, County Durham in 1987.

response: Christopher or Chris Leonard may refer to:
*Chris Leonard, songwriter and member of pop punk band Son of Dork
